UI_visible_response: ：It is located south of the Memorial Hall of the Victims in the Nanjing Massacre by Japanese Invaders. Commonly known as the "Wailing Wall" or "Crying Wall"，it was designed by Qi Kang, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and the dean of the Architectural Design and Research Institute of Southeast University. It was established in 1995 with 3,000 names of the victims of the Nanjing Massacre engraved on it, symbolizing the 300,000 compatriots massacred by the Japanese army. Through multiple inscriptions from 2007 to 2019, the number of names on the wall reached 10,665.Dr. Li Wenliang's Weibo Page：After the death of Dr. Li Wenliang, a coronavirus whistleblower, his Weibo page became a digital gathering space for Chinese netizens. So many comments were left on his final post that it was likened to the Wailing Wall in Jerusalem. Netizens expressed their well-wishes, bared their souls, and shared their frustrations there.
traffic_visible_response: 正在搜索找到 3 篇资料参考There are two possible interpretations of "China's Wailing Wall":- **Nanjing Massacre Victims' Name Wall**：It is located south of the Memorial Hall of the Victims in the Nanjing Massacre by Japanese Invaders. Commonly known as the "Wailing Wall" or "Crying Wall"，it was designed by Qi Kang, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and the dean of the Architectural Design and Research Institute of Southeast University. It was established in 1995 with 3,000 names of the victims of the Nanjing Massacre engraved on it, symbolizing the 300,000 compatriots massacred by the Japanese army. Through multiple inscriptions from 2007 to 2019, the number of names on the wall reached 10,665.- **Dr. Li Wenliang's Weibo Page**：After the death of Dr. Li Wenliang, a coronavirus whistleblower, his Weibo page became a digital gathering space for Chinese netizens. So many comments were left on his final post that it was likened to the Wailing Wall in Jerusalem. Netizens expressed their well-wishes, bared their souls, and shared their frustrations there.
